channel.title: Murder Day 2 (Class cards) Help me tweak then
channel.description:
Class cards rules -Always 1 support will spawn -Can't be more than 2 of a non unique class -I will try to make it balanced
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/murder-day-2-sign-ups-lets-try-this-again/61101?u=firekitten
[details="Friends"] [details="Special"] > ## [color=]Cake Kid [/color] :shield: > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Special[/color]** **Cake Jail(Day)** - Jail someone at night. Preventing them from taking any action. **Execute The Cake (Night)** -I never lie about something! This night ability automatically activates letting you and your target send a 1000 word message *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake [/details]
[details="Offensive"]
> ## [color=] The Scared Kid[/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Offensive[/color]** **Scared Cake(Passive)** -Occupy Immune And Redirect Immune. **(Night) - Scared Little Brother** - You cannot be targeted by abilities tonight, but any effect done to the person you target will also be done to you. Unlimited uses. *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake
> ## [color] The Cake Shield Kid[/color] > [color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Offensive[/color] Cake Shield Shall Lead Me (Passive) -Immune to redirection. Cake Shield (Night) - Reflect all actions on one player to another player. 4 uses. May not target self. GOAL. Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake
> ## [color=]The Chubby Kid (No offense)[/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Offensive[/color]** **Body Blocker (Passive)** - Occupy And Redirection Immune **Blockade (Day)** -Block someone's house preventing any killers from visiting-2 uses **Where you going? (Night)** -Block someone's house preventing anyone from visiting-Unlimited uses may not target the same person twice in a row. *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake [/details]
[details="Investigator"] > ## [color=]The Stalker Kid[/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Investigator[/color]** **(Night) - Sneaky Kid** - See all abilities used on a player. Unlimited uses. Does not count as visiting. *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake
> ## [color=]The Mystery Kid[/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Investigative[/color]** **Who are you? (Day)** -Check to see if someone is a member of the ruiner. Will give you the results at night-1 use **Detective Cake (Night)** -See who the target visits and who visits target-Unlimited *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake
> ## [color=]The Detective Kid[/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Investigative[/color]** **Party Checker (Night)** - Check to see if someone is a member of the ruiner-Unlimited uses *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake [/details]
[details="Social"] > ## [color=]Friendly Kid[/color] > [color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Social[/color] (Night) - Neighborhood Kid- Give 2 players a means of private communicaton at night and day. 2 uses. GOAL. Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake
> ## [color=]Crying Child[/color] :shield: > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Social[/color]** **Never dying (Passive)** - If you die you can still talk in the thread. You can only vote once for the rest of the game after you die. Use your last vote after you die wisely. **Welcome back friends! (Day)** -All dead players may talk in the thread for this day only (You can use this when dead)-1 use **Join us for cake! (Night)** -Use a dead persons ability-Unlimited 1 day cool down. *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake [/details]
[details="Killer"]
> ## [color=]The Blaster Kid[/color] > [color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Killer[/color] Pew Pew (Night) - Shoot someone killing them if they are not a friend member. If they are you die, and they live-2 uses
> ## [color=]The Best Friend Kid [/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Killer [/color]** **(Night) - Overprotective Friend**- Kill everybody who visits target player. 2 uses. *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake [/details]
[details="Support"] > ## [color=]The Doctor Kid[/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Support[/color]** **I don't get enough cake for this. (Day)** - Heal someone extra tonight-1 use **Cake is the cure to everything (Night)** - Heal target. Cures status conditions-Unlimited Uses *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake
> ## [color=]Fighting Kid[/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Support[/color]** **Protector of the cake (Night)** -Protect someone if they are attacked you will kill the attacker bypassing death immunity. You will die as well-Unlimited *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake
> ## [color=]The Trapper Kid[/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Support[/color]** **Luring Cake (Day)** -Trap yourself if a killer visits they shall be occupied the next night bypassing immunity. Saves yourself-2 uses. **Learned to bake from my father (Night)** -Set up a trap at someone's house. It takes a day to set up. If a killer visits them they shall be occupied bypass immunity. The person is saved. not notified-Unlimited uses,, can only have one trap out at once. The neutral killing will know who is trapped. *GOAL.* Lynch all evildoers and eat a lot of cake [/details] [/details]
[details="Ruiners"] > ## [color=Red]The Deadly Bouncer[/color] :shield: > **[color=rED]Killer[/color]** **Blood Cake (Day)** -Cause someone to start bleeding and they will die in 2 days if not healed. The person will be notified silenty in pm.-2 uses **Cake Blockade (Night)** - Block someone's house preventing anyone from visting them besides killers-Unlimited Uses 2 day cool down. *GOAL.* Kill all those who won't give you cake. Neutrals are fine cause they love to give cake. Will be adding more I need help tweaking them
> ## [color=Red]The Spy [/color] :shield: > **[color=rED]Investigator[/color]** **Wheres the cake? (Day)** - Find a person class type-2 uses **Spy Kid! (Night)** -See someone's exact class-Unlimited uses *GOAL.* Kill all those who won't give you cake. Neutrals are fine cause they love to give cake.
> ## [color=Red]The Surgeon [/color] :shield: > **[color=rED]Support[/color]** **Healing Cake (Day)** - Heal all your mafia tonight (1-2 uses) **Death Cake (Night ability)**-Makes it so that your faction bypasses healing and prevention. Not death immunity-1 use **Fake cake (Night ability)**- replaces a person you kill with logs and a class of your choice-2 use *GOAL.* Kill all who won't give you cake. Neutrals are fine cause they love to give cake.
> ## [color=Red]The Cake Sellman[/color] :shield: > **[color=rED]Offensive[/color]** **Cake! (Passive)** - Roleblock and redirection immune **Theres the cake! (Day)** -Roleblock someone bypassing occupy immunity-2 uses you night ability is unaffected and will just occupy someone else besides the day ability targets **Free cake (Night)** - Occupy someone-Unlimited uses *GOAL.* Kill all those who won't give you cake. Neutrals are fine cause they love to give cake.
> ## [color=Red]Connections Guy [/color] :shield: > **[color=rED]Social[/color]** **Connecting the cake (Day)** Hear the cake kid at night and or any private conversations-2 use **Connecting Cake (Night)** - Link two players. They will Be able to talk at night and day. You will hear the conversation. You may link yourself with someone-2 Uses **Canceling cake (Night ability 2)** -Cancel someone's vote for tommorow-2 uses *GOAL.* Kill all those who won't give you cake. Neutrals are fine cause they love to give cake.
> ## [color=Red]The Leader[/color] :shield: > **[color=rED]Special[/color]** **Dealing with the crowd (Passive)** - Roleblock and redirection immune. You have day chat while you are alive. **Look there! (Day)** -Swap the present with someone else-2 use **Framing Cupcake (Night)** -If said person is checked he will show up as a member of the ruiner. If someone tracks him they will see him visiting someone who is dead-Unlimited *GOAL.* Kill all those who won't give you cake. Neutrals are fine cause they love to give cake. [/details]
[details="Neutral Killing"] > ## [color=Black]The Enemy [/color] :shield: > **[color=Black]Neutral Killer[/color]** **I WANT CAKE. (Passive)** - Night Immune. Roleblock And Redirection Immune. **Bad Present (Day)** - Forcefully make someone open a bad present. That you will give them. people can still vote for someone else to receive a present-2 use **Cake Overload(Night)** - Give someone so much cake they explode. (Killing them and only them) *GOAL.* Kill all those who won't give you cake. Neutrals are fine cause they love to give cake. [/details]
[details="Neutral"] > ## [color=[color=#FF0303]F[/color][color=#FF0710]r[/color][color=#FF0B1D]i[/color][color=#FF0F2A]e[/color][color=#FF1337]n[/color][color=#FF1844]d[/color][color=#FF1C51]'[/color][color=#FF205E]s[/color] [color=#FF2878]F[/color][color=#FF2D85]r[/color][color=#FF3192]i[/color][color=#FF359F]e[/color][color=#FF39AC]nd[/color] :shield: > **[color=Grey]Neutral[/color]** **Present Shield (Passive)** -You are night immune. Due to using the present as a shield you will know what will be inside the present the night before.. **Present Trader(Day)** - Choose what's inside the present-3 uses **Present Stealer (Night)** - Steal someone's present occupying them for the night. *GOAL.* Survive to see the friends die.
> ## [color=fve]Paranoid Cupcake (Neutral)[/color] :shield: > **[color=fvINSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]Support[/color]** **Paranoid (Passive)** -Roleblock Immune. **Good Present For You (Day)** -Choose a good present. That will be the present for today-1 use **Bad Present For You (Day)** -Choose a bad present. That will be the present for today-1 use **Go away you cupcake eaters (Night)** -Kill all your visitors. Not bypassing death immunity. You shall be death immune tonight-3 use **NIGHT ABILITY 2 (Night)** -Heal someone. Cures status conditions-Unlimited Uses **GOAL**. Survive
> ## [color=Blue]The Mistreated Kid[/color] :shield: > **[color=Orange]Social[/color]** **Angery Cake(Passive)** - Your abilities get disabled if you get your targets executed. You are immune to occupation redirection and death at night. If both your targets die N1 you get one new target. **Deciving Cake (Night)** -Frame one of your targets. They will be seen as visting the person killed or a member of the ruiner-2 use *GOAL.* Get X or Y lynched at all cost.
> ## [color=Pink]The Balloon Kid[/color] :shield: > **[color=Purple]Offensive[/color]** **Balloons! (Passive)** -You are immune to occupation redirection and death at night. **Balloon for you (Day)** -Give someone a balloon in the day time. A message will show up to everyone. "With this balloon you shall fly and with these words you shall die" (Insert name of target) They can't be saved from death tonight. If someone tries to attack them they are dead no matter what (people jailed can attack him if a attacker, cause the balloons are powerful)-1 use (If he dies you can win with everyone but 1 person receiving a balloon. Everyone has a balloon except X you still win if you used this) **Balloon (Night)** -Give someone a balloon occupying them for the night. *GOAL.* Give every alive person a balloon besides you cause you have a balloon.
> ## [color=Aqua]Cupcake [/color] :shield: > **[color=greeeee]Support[/color]** **Cupcake! (Passive)** -You are immune to occupation redirection and death at night. **My cupcake brother/sister (Day)** -Prevent your target from getting voted today-1 use **No one is eating this cupcake (Night)** -Guard your target preventing anyone from visting-4 uses **GOAL**-Make sure X survives at all cost.
> ## [color=Yellow]Muffin Destroyer [/color] :shield: > **[color=ccc]Investigative[/color]** **MUFFINS! (Passive)** -You are immune to occupation redirection and death at night. **DIE MUFFINS! (Day)**-Eliminate a muffin from a person. If they had a muffin you detain them for questioning (Occupy bypassing immunity). If they have none this goes on a 1 day cool down-Unlimited Uses. **Muffin Scent(Night)** -Investigate a person and see if they are hiding a muffin. If they do not have a muffin in rage of not finding one you occupy them-Unlimited Uses. **GOAL**-Find and destroy all 4 muffins!
Idea from @Margaret and @Pug games. Thought it would be fun to add something like that. [/details]

Others that I probally forgot about

item.title: Murder Day 2 (Class cards) Help me tweak then
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Since to be fair to others who already know the presents joker and psy. I tell the presents cause it would be unfair

-One time night immunity
-Poisionous cake
-Occupy immunity
-Redirection immunity
-Healer Circle-Heals everyone who visits you
-Death Circle-Kills everyone who visits you not bypassing death immunity
-Preventing anyone from visiting you tonight
-Any actions against you will succeed and your actions will succeed to
-Death Mark-Can’t be saved from any attack tonight

Will add more as time goes on

Read full topic

item.source: Murder Day 2 (Class cards) Help me tweak then

item.title: Murder Day 2 (Class cards) Help me tweak then
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Muffin Destroyer

Investigative
MUFFINS! (Passive) -You are immune to occupation redirection and death at night.
DIE MUFFINS! (Day)-Eliminate a muffin from a person. If they have none this goes on a 1 day cool down-Unlimited Uses.
Muffin Scent(Night) -Investigate a person and see if they are hiding a muffin-Unlimited Uses.
GOAL-Find and destroy all 5 muffins!

Read full topic
